title: suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for 0utdoors, Ultrasonic Snake Repeller Outdoor, Snake Repellent for Yard Powerful, Snake Away Scare for Outdoors Lawn Garden and Yard
descriptions:
Introducing the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors - the ultimate solution to keep snakes away from your yard, garden, and lawn! With its advanced ultrasonic technology, this snake repellent ensures maximum effectiveness in deterring snakes from your outdoor spaces.

Featuring an emission interval of every 30 seconds, this repellent covers an impressive 7000 sq. ft. of area, providing comprehensive protection. Made with premium quality materials, this product guarantees durability and long-lasting performance.

Powered by solar energy, this snake repellent is not only eco-friendly but also cost-effective. Its IP44 waterproof rating ensures reliable operation even in challenging weather conditions. Plus, it is completely safe for children and pets, giving you peace of mind while enjoying your outdoor spaces.

Not only does this repellent keep snakes away, but it also repels a variety of other animals such as deers, cats, rabbits, dogs, raccoons, skunks, rats, mice, armadillos, wild pigs, bears, foxes, and squirrels. Say goodbye to unwanted intruders in your yard!

With a repellent effectiveness time of 2-4 weeks, you can enjoy snake-free outdoor spaces for an extended period. The sonic pulses emitted at a frequency of 400+/-100Hz ensure snakes and other animals stay far away from your property.

Installing the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent is a breeze. Simply charge it for 4-5 hours under the sun and place it 2 inches above the soil. Follow these tips for optimal performance.

Don't let snakes ruin your outdoor experience. Invest in the suphanlin 4 Pack Snake Repellent for Outdoors today and create a safe and snake-free environment for you, your family, and your pets!
